SongLyrics.JpnStr: 運命[うんめい]なんて 言[い]えない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I can't say it's fate.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あと 何[なん]センチ 近付[ちかづ]けば 良[い]いんだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: How many more centimeters should I get closer?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が いいと 言[い]えないまま 見[み]つめてる 後[うし]ろ 姿[すがた]
SongLyrics.EngStr: I keep watching your back without being able to say you're the one.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 余裕[よゆう]のない 日々[ひび]です
SongLyrics.EngStr: These are days without any room to breathe.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: デートなんて 自信[じしん]がないな
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm not confident about dates at all.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が 眩[まぶ]しい 程[ほど]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The more dazzling you are,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]は 情[なさ]けなくなってく
SongLyrics.EngStr: the more pathetic I feel.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: (会[あ]えない 時間[じかん] + 君[きみ]が 笑[わら]った 瞬間[しゅんかん]) ÷ 2 の この ときめきと
SongLyrics.EngStr: (The time we can't meet + the moment you smiled) ÷ 2 is this excitement.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 不器用[ぶきよう]な 僕[ぼく] × 強[つよ]がりな 君[きみ]は 案外[あんがい]プラスかもって
SongLyrics.EngStr: Clumsy me × strong-willed you might surprisingly be a plus.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 気付[きづ]いて しまったら 最後[さいご]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Once I realized it, that was the end.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: まだね 運命[うんめい]なんて 言[い]えない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I still can't say it's fate.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あと 何[なん]センチ 近付[ちかづ]けば 良[い]いんだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: How many more centimeters should I get closer?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]は 君[きみ]に 何[なに]を してあげれるかな
SongLyrics.EngStr: What can I do for you?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あの 日[ひ] 大丈夫[だいじょうぶ]って 笑顔[えがお]
SongLyrics.EngStr: That day, you smiled and said 'It's okay.'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あと 何[なん]センチ 先[さき]を 歩[ある]いてんだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: How many more centimeters ahead are you walking?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が いいと 言[い]えば 追[お]いつけるのかな 届[とど]くのかな
SongLyrics.EngStr: If you say it's okay, will I catch up? Will I reach you?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ふとした 瞬間[しゅんかん]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: In a fleeting moment,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の 寂[さび]しさを 知[し]ったんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I learned about your loneliness.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 弱[よわ]い 僕[ぼく]は ほらね
SongLyrics.EngStr: Look, weak as I am,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 離[はな]れられなくなっていく
SongLyrics.EngStr: I find it harder to let go.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: (やっと 来[き]た チャンス + いただけない この 会話[かいわ]) ÷ 2 で 虚[むな]しくたって
SongLyrics.EngStr: (Finally got a chance + unsatisfactory conversation) ÷ 2 feels so empty.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 不確[ふたし]かな 今日[きょう] × 不安定[ふあんてい]な 感情[かんじょう]だからこそ 僕[ぼく]は 君[きみ]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: Because of uncertain days × unstable feelings, I might have found you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 見[み]つけられたのかもしれない
SongLyrics.EngStr: Maybe that's why I was able to find you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だから 運命[うんめい]だって 信[しん]じたい
SongLyrics.EngStr: That's why I want to believe in fate.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今[いま] 数[すう]センチ 近付[ちかづ]いても 良[い]いかな
SongLyrics.EngStr: Is it okay if I come a few centimeters closer now?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 胸[むね]を 裂[さ]くよ 振[ふ]り 向[む]いてくれるたびに
SongLyrics.EngStr: It tears at my heart each time you turn toward me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の 笑顔[えがお]も 言葉[ことば]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your smile and words too.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もう 何[なん]センチ 積[つ]もって 消[き]えやしない
SongLyrics.EngStr: They keep piling up and won't disappear.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 綺麗[きれい]事[ごと]じゃ 片付[かたづ]けられない 程[ほど]に 想[おも]っている
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm thinking of you in a way that can't be explained by pleasantries.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 運命[うんめい]だって 言[い]えるまで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Until I can call it fate,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 笑[わら]ったように 見[み]せた 君[きみ]に 届[とど]くまで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Until I reach you, who pretended to smile.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 特別[とくべつ]じゃない 今[いま]の 僕[ぼく]に 出来[でき]ること
SongLyrics.EngStr: What I can do as the ordinary me right now.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: まだね 運命[うんめい]なんて 言[い]えない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I still can't say it's fate.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あと 何[なん]センチ 近付[ちかづ]けば 良[い]いんだろう
SongLyrics.EngStr: How many more centimeters should I get closer?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]は 少[すこ]し 変[か]わっていける 気[き]がする
SongLyrics.EngStr: I feel like I can change a little.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 辿[たど]り着[つ]いた 時[とき]は 君[きみ]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: When I finally reach you,

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 大丈夫[だいじょうぶ]だよ 僕[ぼく]が 先[さき]に 言[い]うから
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll be the first to say 'It's okay.'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が 好[す]きだ 終[お]わらない この 想[おも]いが 届[とど]きますように
SongLyrics.EngStr: I love you, and may these endless feelings reach you.
